title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: All Night Show Star Path Duties
description: Another update, another Star Path to complete--that's the Disney Dreamlight Valley way. This time around, players will be working on The Night Show Star Path, bringing all of the usual rewards like decorative items, character cosmetics, and more to work toward over the next few months. If you're feeling stuck on how to solve any of the Star Path's riddles, we've got you covered with a full list of all duties and how to complete them.All Night Show Star Path Duties and how to complete themBanish some Night Thorns - Have daily conversations with Scrooge McDuckCollect seafood on the sand - Pick up Clams, Oysters, or Scallops in Dazzle BeachCollect some fungi - Pick up mushrooms in Glade of TrustComplete Boutique Challenges with Daisy - Complete challenges in Daisy's BoutiqueComplete some Royal Duties - Complete Dreamlight dutiesCook a 4-star main course - Cook any 4-star entreesCook a 5-star main course - Cook any 5-star entreesCraft any large Elixir - Craft a potionDig for pottery material - Dig for clayEmbrace your Royal duty - Complete Dreamlight dutiesEnter a DreamSnaps competition - Submit a DreamSnapsFeed Villagers in Chez Remy or Tiana's Palace - excerpt: It's time again to knock out some Star Path duties if you want all of the new rewards.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Another update, another Star Path to complete--that's the Disney Dreamlight Valley way. This time around, players will be working on The Night Show Star Path, bringing all of the usual rewards like decorative items, character cosmetics, and more to work toward over the next few months. If you're feeling stuck on how to solve any of the Star Path's riddles, we've got you covered with a full list of all duties and how to complete them.

All Night Show Star Path Duties and how to complete them

  • Banish some Night Thorns - Remove Night Thorns or Splinters of Fate
  • Bring favorite gifts to a tiny chef - Give Remy favorite gifts
  • Bring food to customers at Tiana's or Remy's restaurants - Serve meals at one of the restaurants
  • Cast for an Angler - Catch Angler in the Forgotten Lands
  • Catch fish somewhere Dazzling - Catch any fish in Dazzle Beach
  • Chat with Mickey Mouse - Have daily conversations with Mickey Mouse
  • Chat with a friendly warthog - Have daily conversations with Pumbaa
  • Chat with an adventurer and investor - Have daily conversations with Scrooge McDuck
  • Collect seafood on the sand - Pick up Clams, Oysters, or Scallops in Dazzle Beach
  • Collect some fungi - Pick up mushrooms in Glade of Trust
  • Complete Boutique Challenges with Daisy - Complete challenges in Daisy's Boutique
  • Complete some Royal Duties - Complete Dreamlight duties
  • Cook a 4-star main course - Cook any 4-star entrees
  • Cook a 5-star main course - Cook any 5-star entrees
  • Craft any large Elixir - Craft a potion
  • Dig for pottery material - Dig for clay
  • Embrace your Royal duty - Complete Dreamlight duties
  • Enter a DreamSnaps competition - Submit a DreamSnaps
  • Feed Villagers in Chez Remy or Tiana's Palace - Serve meals at one of the restaurants
  • Feed hungry folks at Remy's or Tiana's - Serve meals at one of the restaurants
  • Find Diamonds with your Pickaxe - Mine for Diamonds
  • Find Memories - Discover any type of memory orbs
  • Find Memories - Discover any type of memory orbs
  • Find gems with your Pickaxe - Mine for any gem
  • Finish Boutique Challenges with Daisy - Complete challenges in Daisy's Boutique
  • Fish Perch in the Forest - Catch Perch in the Forest of Valor
  • Fish for Catfish somewhere Peaceful - Catch Catfish in Peaceful Meadow
  • Fish for Tilapia somewhere Sunny - Catch Tilapia in Sunlit Plateau
  • Get crafty - Craft any items
  • Get some quality time with your neighbors - Hang out with any character
  • Give a starry-eyed robot his favorite gifts - Give WALL-E favorite gifts
  • Give an elemental force of nature her favorite gifts - Give Elsa favorite gifts
  • Give favorite gifts to a shapeshifting demigod - Give Maui favorite gifts
  • Give favorite gifts to a talkative meerkat - Give Timon favorite gifts
  • Give the ruler of Pride Rock his favorite gifts - Give Simba favorite gifts
  • Go fish - Catch any fish
  • Harvest red fruit with a pit - Harvest cherries
  • Look after the Valley... Royally - Complete Dreamlight duties
  • Mine for a black gemstone - Mine for Onyx in any biome
  • Mine for any gems - Mine for any gems
  • Mine for gems somewhere Peaceful - Mine nodes in Peaceful Meadow
  • Mine for shinies - Mine for any shiny gems
  • Pick some berries that are blue - Harvest Blueberries
  • Pick some crunchy red fruit - Harvest Apples
  • Pluck some dark blooms - Pick any black flowers
  • Polish off some Royal tasks - Complete Dreamlight duties
  • Prepare a 5-star starter - Cook any 5-star appetizers
  • Prepare some 4-star sweetness - Cook any 4-star desserts
  • Submit an entry to DreamSnaps - Submit a DreamSnaps
  • Tackle Royal tasks - Complete Dreamlight duties
  • Tackle your Royal To-Do List - Complete Dreamlight duties
  • Take on Challenges with Daisy in the Boutique - Complete challenges in Daisy's Boutique
  • Talk to a skilled huntress on four paws - Have daily conversations with Nala
  • Talk to the Valley's top vegetable merchant - Have daily conversations with Goofy
  • Talk with the lion who would have been king - Have daily conversations with Scar
  • Wait tables with Remy or Tiana - Serve meals at one of the restaurants
  • Whip up a 5-star dessert - Cook any 5-star desserts
  • Whip up some 4-star meals - Cook any 4-star entrees
  • Work a shift in Chez Remy or Tiana's Palace - Serve meals at one of the restaurants
  • Work a shift with Tiana or Remy - Serve meals at one of the restaurants

For more on Disney Dreamlight Valley, check out our comprehensive guides hub.

Please use a html5 video capable browser to watch videos.
